moreBlocks.articles:
• Auto Accidents
    The effects of a car accident are far reaching. The attorneys at Bremer & Trollop understand the Wisconsin Rules of the Road and the complexities of motor vehicle accidents.
  • Workers'Comp
    When you are injured on the job, it is the responsibility of your employer to cover your medical expenses and lost wages. By law, all employers must cover expenses resulting from employees' injuries received while on the job.
  • Hunting & Firearm Accidents
    While the vast majority of hunters in central Wisconsin follow safety guidelines, there are always exceptions to the rule. A hunting accident can forever change the life of the person injured.

description:
Serving clients throughout Wood and Marathon counties from their office in Marshfield, Wisconsin, the dedicated and nationally ranked legal professionals at Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., are fully prepared to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need and the justice you deserve for your serious and complex legal challenges arising from any of the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Workplace accidents
  • Farm accidents
  • Nursing home injuries
  • Dog bites and animal attacks
  • Asbestos, mesothelioma and toxic exposure
  • DePuy hip claims
  • Surgical mesh claims
  • Other defective medical device and dangerous pharmaceutical claims
  • Wrongful death

Over the past 30 years, Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., has achieved unprecedented growth and success, with five total offices across the state. This success is the direct result of the firm's lawyers' extensive legal experience coupled with their unwavering commitment to those they serve, and they have achieved a long record of securing substantial settlements and verdicts for their plaintiff clients.

As further testament to the level of success they have achieved, their lawyers have earned AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell along with Top 100 Trial Lawyer rankings from the National Trial Lawyers and numerous other accolades and endorsements from their peers. In addition, the firm's attorneys have received countless testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients, and they find great satisfaction in being able to help so many in their region during their most dire times of need.

To find out more about how they can best help you secure a better life for yourself and your loved ones, you can contact Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., to schedule a free initial consultation. The firm also currently offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your family members safe and healthy.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
